summary: Aeriana is a level one character save outside riverwood (skips helgen entirely). Probably my fav. girl I have made so far, pretty but not without character. Inventory is just how I had it on an original file I use now to make characters- it has most of what I could carry from Helgen and things I picked up on the way to Riverwood.
descriptionHtml:
Aeriana is a level one character (Breton not Nord like my other girls) save outside riverwood (skips helgen entirely).Probably my fav. girl I have made so far, pretty but not without character . Inventory is just how I had it on an original file I use now to make characters- it has most of what I could carry from Helgen and things I picked up on the way to Riverwood.

Feel free to make any changes to her! For instance if you don\'t like the scar all you have to do is load the save, go into a small cell like the riverwood trader to prevent freezing, pull up your console using \" ~ \" (the tilde mark), and type in \'showracemenu\' (no quotes) . This command will bring up the character creation menu and you can change anything about your character from there! 

In order for her to appear as in the screenshots you will need the following mods: 
*They are listed in the order in which I installed them via NMM

ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii v 1.5 full
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

UNP Replacer Configuration Package by sillumlt- the options I used were the UNP base body with the navetsea skin and fitness body less abs & shaved 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20884

UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB - With Optional BBP Breast Physics by calyps - xp32 - mrtroublemaker -dimon99 original creator of UNP- v2-2x fixed
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899
I installed this on top of the UNP congfig after trying several BBP options because I like the effect this process renders- feel free to do it your own way

The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722

No More Blocky Faces by Xenius
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30

LiFE - Lith Face Enhancement -CBBE-UNP-UNPB by LithiumFlower- install last, overwrite if necessary, I love this skin! 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26354

Better Females by Bella - Eyebrows only option found under misc files
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812#content

All credits go to the above mod authors- Thanks!

Installation:
Extract file using 7zip or related program, place the .ess file in your save game folder (usually found in documents/my games/skyrim/saves) ***You may download with the manager and open the NMM folder for mods if it is easier for you but NMM WILL NOT INSTALL THE SAVE FOR YOU. You must place the save yourself into your save game folder, I promise it isn\'t hard!


*please note that I am using Skyrim HD texture lite mod in the screenshots (an amazing mod!)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/607
and Boris\' enb kage version 
http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0112.htm
 with
 stakado vers B cinematic enb settings (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12180)

The armor pictured is from asianboy345\'s Remodeled Armors for UNP (my fav armor replacer!)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19772
author: tbowers
